mapper.sql: id, message_title, message_body, message_ticker, message_group, message_send_time,province_name, message_created_time, operator, memo,message_type,driver_name
mapper.select:
select
from sys_message where 1=1
and message_title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{messageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and message_send_time between CONCAT(#{message_created_time_after,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 0:00:00') and CONCAT(#{message_created_time_before,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' 23:59:59')
and message_type = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from sys_message where 1=1
and message_type = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and province_name like concat(concat('%',#{province_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
